original_text: But I have nothing definite to write to my lord about him. Therefore I have brought him before you all, and especially before you, King Agrippa, so that, after we have examined him, I may have something to write.
korean_text: 그에 대하여 황제께 확실한 사실을 아뢸 것이 없으므로 심문한 후 상소할 자료가 있을까 하여 당신들 앞 특히 아그립바 왕 당신 앞에 그를 내세웠나이다

sentences.original_text: But I have nothing definite to write
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 쓸 만한 명확한 것이 없습니다

sentences.original_text: Therefore I have brought him before you all
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 그를 여러분 앞에 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and especially before you, King Agrippa
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 특히 아그립바 왕이신 당신 앞에

sentences.original_text: so that, after we have examined him
I may have something to write
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 쓸 것이 있도록 하기 위함입니다
